roleset.name: sell
roleset.note: No Verbnet entry. I always find it curious when there's a note in a frame file saying the verb no longer exists in English. Such a note no longer exists in this frame file.

example.name: adjectival
example.text: Children who eat vended snack foods face chronic health problems.

example.name: both args
example.text: Sonilall, a father of five, had a stall at the Stabroek Market, where-1 he vended his salt fish *trace*-1, and he also exported the product overseas.
example.arg: where -> a stall at the Starbroek Market

predicate.note: Frames file for 'vend' based on sentences in wsj.
